ingredients.content: 50 g onions, cut in pieces (2 cm)
60 g carrots, cut in pieces (2 cm)
250 g sweet potatoes, cut in pieces (2 cm)
90 g pears, cut in pieces (2 cm)
100 g chicken breast, cut in pieces (1 cm)
60 g courgettes, cut in pieces (2 cm)

preparations.content: Place onions, carrots, sweet potatoes and pears in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add stock and chicken breast then cook <b>12 min/90°C/speed 1<b>.
Add courgettes and cook again <b>2 min/90°C/speed 1<b>, then scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Blend <b>20 sec/speed 9<b>. Allow to cool, then serve warm, freezing any leftovers in individual portions.
